name: Sediment supply
functionStatement: Surface water-groundwater exchange moderates temperature, transforms nutrients, supplies oxygen, and supports aquatic life.
descriptionMarkdown: Springs/seeps/subsurface flow show active hyporheic exchange, matching local reference.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Overlay slope (DEM), soils (for example SSURGO erodibility and texture), land cover, and roads to estimate relative sediment delivery risk to the reach.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Low predicted sediment delivery risk, and coarse bed conditions are likely to remain open.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Moderate to high delivery risk, likely increasing fines and clogging.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Very high delivery risk, likely driving chronic fine sediment deposition and reduced exchange.

references: DEM slope, SSURGO soils, and roads/land cover layers.
